name: Encrypt.me - Super Simple VPN
description: Public Wi-Fi isnt safe.  Encrypt.me is the solution.  Encrypt.me keeps you safe on Public Wi-Fi with no fiddling or fuss.  With Encrypt.mes auto-secure feature, you dont even need to remember that you *have* Encrypt.me -- just connect to that coffee shop, or airport, or hotel, or conference Wi-Fi and trust that Encrypt.mes got your back.  Enjoy a 14 Day Free Trial - No Credit Card needed. Starting monthly at $9.99 per user or $12.99 up to 5 users  What else is cool about Encrypt.me? So much:   With a beautiful, minimal user interface and quick access to all the important controls, Encrypt.me makes it effortless to manage your online security.   Encrypt.me knows which networks you trust, and which you dont... and Encrypt.me automatically secures your connection when you use an untrusted network.   All of your preferences are cloud synced to all of your devices  As always, we welcome your comments and feedback and, yes, even your bug reports. To get in touch, send us an email: hello@encrypt.me -- we are here to help, so please do say hello!
